Current driver¶

class current_driver.CurrentDriver(port1, port2, parent=None, labjack=None)¶

Bases: archetypes.node.Device

Current driver for quadrupole coils using two TDK Genesys programmable power supplies and a bespoke current servo board.

__init__(port1, port2, parent=None, labjack=None)¶

Initialize the Device for use.

_actuate(state)¶

Set the gradient and zero position of the magnetic field.

_connect()¶

Connect to and initialize the power supplies, then run IV calibration.

calibrate(coil, Vmin=1, Vmax=3, steps=100, delay=0.01)¶

Measure and fit the IV curve of the FETs.

measure_current(coil)¶

Measure the Hall probe current.

set_current(coil, current)¶

Sets the current of the targeted coil. 0-5V corresponds to 0-100 A.

set_field(grad, z0)¶

Args: gradient in G/cm, z0 in mm. The zero position is relative to the center of the coils, along the axis pointing from coil 1 to coil 2.

wave(frequency=1, duty_cycle=0.5, reps=50, grad=50, z0=5)¶

Square pulse the B-field between 0 and a set configuration.
